content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Inserter (position a) that puts coal into the second stone furnace
- Inserter (position b) that puts iron ore into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position c) that puts iron ore into the second stone furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have sufficient resources before performing actions that depend on them.
